title: The Billionaire's Desire
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.The sizzling adventure continues in this alpha billionaire romance series. The scintillating, steamy and passionate romance between Ciara and Nikolaj picks up where the last book ended. The only difference is that Ciara discovers Nikolajâ€™s true penchant for domination and to her surprise, she relishes submitting herself to him. Ciara returns to New York and she's trying her darnedest to put her naughty weekend in Toronto behind her by immersing herself back into her safe routine. Unfortunately for her, the dirty-talking demi-God isn't willing to go out quietly. The second book in this series will satisfy the true alpha billionaire romance lover in you and will leave you EVEN MORE hot & bothered. The Seduction Factor is a series of 6 books. The entire series has a HEA ending.
author: Scarlett Avery
